snippet: Employees at a clinic in Fort Collins were told to make it appear as if patients were getting appointments close to the day requested, according to an investigation.
abstract: Investigators from Veterans Affairs Dept report that employees at veterans medical clinic in Fort Collins, Colo, were instructed to falsify records to make it appear that patients were getting appointments close to day requested.
lead_paragraph: Employees at a clinic in Fort Collins were told to make it appear as if patients were getting appointments close to the day requested, according to an investigation.

headline.main: Colorado: Records Falsified at Veterans Clinic, Inquiry Finds
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Records Are Falsified at Veterans Clinic, Inquiry Finds
